col_1: Dash (-) represents zero or rounds to zero.

The Census Bureau has reviewed this data product to ensure appropriate access, use, and disclosure avoidance protection of the confidential source data used to produce this product (Data Management System (DMS) number:  P-6000042 and P-7501659. Disclosure Review Board (DRB) approval number: CBDRB-FY25-0078).

Note: The estimates are developed from a base that integrates the 2020 Census and Vintage 2020 estimates. For population estimates methodology statements, see https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/technical-documentation/methodology.html. All geographic boundaries for the 2024 population estimates series are as of January 1, 2024.
Annual and Cumulative Estimates of Resident Population Change for Municipios in Puerto Rico and Municipio Rankings: April 1, 2020 to July 1, 2024 (PRM-EST2024-CHG)
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division
